import axios from 'axios' import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { getCSRF } from "../features/auth/authService" export default function AddDevice({ toast }) { const [formData, setformData] = useState({ mac: '', type: '' }) const { mac, type } = formData const [message, setMessage] = useState('') function onChange(e) { setformData((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) } function onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() let userData = { mac, type } console.log('registering device with following data:') console.log(userData) } return (
